entry.title: Crypto Venture Investment Falls 20% in Q3, AI Startups Defy Trend
entry.summary: Venture capital investment in the crypto sector continued to decline in the third quarter of 2024, following a persistent downtrend that began earlier this year. However, while overall numbers were down, early-stage startups in areas like AI and blockchain infrastructure captured the bulk of the remaining interest. According to a report by Galaxy, the total venture capital investment in crypto and blockchain-focused startups reached $2.4 billion in Q3 2024, a 20% decline from the previous quarter. Similarly, the number of deals also fell by 17%, with 478 deals completed. Venture Capital Investments This dip in activity is partly due to the ongoing sluggishness in the broader crypto market, which has been stuck in a "barbell" situation, Bitcoin on one end and meme coins o‚Ä¶

entry.title: Dogecoin Price Will Rally 10x To $1 By December, Shiba Inu Will Rally To $0.0005, While ETFSwap (ETFS) Goes From $0.03846 To $35
entry.summary:
The markets are always buzzing with predictions, and the latest one is turning heads. Dogecoin price, a fan favourite, is expected to rally to $1 before December. Shiba Inu (SHIB), however, could shoot up to $0.0005. But perhaps the most shocking of them all is ETFSwap (ETFS), an Ethereum token, which could rise from $0.03846 To $35.¬†
ETFSwap (ETFS) Shows Promising Signs Of Long-term Prospects And Sustainability The core feature of ETFSwap (ETFS) lies in its ability to tokenize Spot ETFs. By tokenizing real-world assets, including gold, oil, and corn, ETFSwap (ETFS) taps into the massive ETF market and serves as a bridge linking both traditional ETFs and cryptocurrency-focused ETFs. This, in turn, removes the need of intermediaries while promoting flexibility and accessibility of Spot E‚Ä¶

entry.title: Why Did The Dogecoin Price Rally Over 7% To Outpeform Bitcoin And Shiba Inu?
entry.summary:
The Dogecoin price has rallied by over 7% in the last 24 hours, outperforming Bitcoin and Shiba Inu. This price rally is primarily thanks to the world‚Äôs richest man, Elon Musk, who continues to support the foremost meme coin indirectly.¬†
Why The Dogecoin Price Rallied By Over 7%
The Dogecoin price rallied by over 7% following Musk‚Äôs tweet, in which he alluded to ‚ÄòD.O.G.E.‚Äô Musk simply said in his post, ‚ÄúD.O.G.E will fix it,‚Äù in response to another post asserting that politicians and bureaucrats are the greatest threat to human progress and flourishing.¬†
The acronym stands for the ‚ÄòDepartment of Government Efficiency,‚Äô a position that Musk could occupy under a Donald Trump administration. The former US President has said that if elected, he wants to use Musk‚Äôs expertise to curb exce‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin Surge Imminent? Arthur Hayes Links War-Fueled Inflation To Crypto Boom
entry.summary:
Better times for Bitcoin may lie ahead as the co-founder of BitMEX feels that the current geopolitical tensions in the Middle East may only push the cryptocurrency to rise higher. According to Arthur Hayes, the effects of war would resonate intensely in the US economy in the form of increased government spending and inflationary levels of monetary policy.
Hayes believes more borrowing will ensue with increasing military spending and that this borrowing will be serviced by more balance sheet expansion by the Federal Reserve and commercial banks, all ultimately to the detriment of the US dollar.
Hayes is quick to note that in times when traditional fiat currencies are weakening, Bitcoin stands to gain because it acts as a hedge against inflation. The recent increase of the US Producer ‚Ä¶

entry.summary: Eric Council Jr. allegedly hijacked the SEC's X account and then handed control to unnamed co-conspirators, whose fake post drove up bitcoin's price.

entry.title: Fake Bitcoin ETF Approval Post: FBI Arrests Individual Linked To SEC Twitter Hack
entry.summary:
The US Department of Justice (DOJ) announced the arrest of Alabama resident Eric Council Jr. in connection with the infamous hack of the US Securities and Exchange Commission‚Äôs (SEC) X account in January 2024, which resulted in a fraudulent post falsely claiming that the SEC had approved the listing of Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs).
Fraudulent Bitcoin ETF Announcement
The indictment reveals that on January 9, 2024, the Council and accomplices orchestrated the unauthorized takeover of the SEC‚Äôs X account. They posted a message claiming, ‚ÄúToday the SEC grants approval for #Bitcoin ETFs for listing on all registered national securities exchanges.‚Äù¬†
This false announcement rapidly increased Bitcoin‚Äôs price, which later plummeted by over $2,000 once the SEC confirmed the post res‚Ä¶

Gensler may be replaced by Robinhood CLO. 87% of new token launches on SOL. National Bank of Bahrain creates BTC fund. BedRock DeFi allows BTC staking on ARB.

entry.title: Memecoins take off, funding stays low, China stocks keep on rising!
entry.summary: FOMO HOUR EP213. Memecoins take off, funding stays low, China stocks keep on rising! Many altcoins & memecoins soar despite stable BTC. Funding rates continue to be low or negative. Crypto funds saw $147m of outflows last week. BTC remains best performing major assets this year. SUI breaks into the top 20 coins again. TAO leads top 100 away from memes, sifu shorts. $100m bridge to SOL over the last 7 days. Metaplanet buys $6.7m more BTC. ETH proposal aims to improve throughput 50%. EIGEN, OP, APT lead token unlocks this week.

entry.title: How Walrus Protocol Unlocks New Applications for Decentralized Data Storage
entry.summary: Mysten Labs Chief Scientist George Danezis joined Decrypt to talk about its new decentralized storage protocol Walrus, which promises to unlock new applications such as AI and social media, thanks to its novel Red Stuff data encoding algorithm.

entry.title: Why Coinbase Sees Crypto as a Bipartisan, 'Purple' Political Issue
entry.summary: Coinbase VP of Corporate and Business Development, Shan Aggarwal, joined Decrypt's Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss the exchange's efforts to grow mainstream crypto adoption‚Äîand how the changing political conversation around digital assets is rapidly playing a major role in that.

entry.title: Binance Is Playing Offense‚ÄîNot Just Defense‚ÄîAgainst Crypto Crime, Says Head of Financial Investigations
entry.summary: Nils Anderson R√∂ed, the exchange‚Äôs global head of financial investigations, sat down with Decrypt‚Äôs Sander Lutz at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss how Binance is proactively dismantling criminal networks around the world, the strategy with which the crypto exchange is approaching sensitive conflicts in the Middle East, and more.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 212 - SEEDPHRASE TALKS ART!
entry.summary: Payrolls Higher than expected, Bitcoin reacts hard. Crypto sank early in the week as Middle East tensions spooked markets. Powell signals two more rate cuts this year. SUI leads L1s again, nears YTD high despite large unlock. Majority of FTX repayments still months away. EIGEN becomes non-transferable, hits $6bn FDV. SEC to appeal Ripple securities law ruling. Visa launches tokenization platform for banks. SWIFT plans digital asset trial in 2025. ByBit launched trading of global stock indices. SPX, GIGA & FWOG hit ATHs, most memes fall. XCOPY to release 250 piece collection on Shape. HBO documentary claims to have identified Satoshi.

entry.title: Altcoins bleed, ByBit launches stock index trading, POCHITA soars
entry.summary: Altcoins sink, BTC dominance nears cycle high. BTC in ‚Äòthree blind mice‚Äô downtrend. Tron revenue hits record $577m in Q3. ByBit to launch trading of major stock indices. Franklin Templeton launch fund on APT. SWIFT banks to trial digital assets in 2025. Aerodrome hits $1bn TVL on Base. Cronje calls out Aerodrome for copyright. ETH ICO wallet sells $47m. SEC files appeal against Ripple ruling. EIGEN falls 20% on staking rewards FUD. FTX to auction off WLD position. Half of US voters think crypto ‚Äòimportant‚Äô. North Korea ‚Äòinfiltrating‚Äô crypto industry. Snowden challenged over SOL centralisation view. Top SEC official on crypto set to depart.

entry.title: DACOM Summit: Fastex CLO Vardan Khachatryan on Crypto Compliance
entry.summary: Fastex Chief Legal Officer Vardan Khachatryan joined Rug Radio creator Mlow at DACOM Summit to discuss how the crypto exchange is advancing compliance, and the regulatory challenges that lie ahead for the sector.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 210 - MIDDLE EAST TENSIONS RISE
entry.summary: Crypto drops as Middle East tensions flare. $500m liquidations in drop. BTC ETFs see largest outflows in a month. Fidelity ETH ETF sees 2nd highest outflow ever. SUI hits 6-month highs, bridge goes live on mainnet. Hashdex set to launch XRP ETF. Wormhole leads altcoin gains after Upbit lists. BTC miners hit record low profits in September Crypto hackers stole $750m in Q3. Telegram has been disclosing IPs since 2018.

entry.title: How Arbitrum is Simplifying Web3 for Web2 Adopters
entry.summary: Arbitrum's Head of Korea, John Park, joined Rug Radio creator Pukerainbow at ArbiVerse to talk about the Ethereum layer-2's strategy in Asia, hackathons, and bringing enterprise clients to its ecosystem.

entry.title: Rep. Tom Emmer Is Confident Crypto Laws Are Coming Soon‚ÄîNo Matter Who Wins the Election
entry.summary: Republican Majority Whip Tom Emmer sat down with Decrypt‚Äôs Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano to discuss the state of crypto legislation, Kamala Harris, Fairshake, and more at Messari Mainnet 2024.
